channel.title: Tiler on OpenAerialMap Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Tiler on OpenAerialMap Docs

item.title: Tiler
item.description: The Tiler is the tool and API to generate tiled map service endpoints from OAM imagery. See oam-server-tiler, oam-server-api, and oam-server-cli for details on the OAM Tiler components. The OpenAerialMap Mosaic has documentation for filtering the mosaic as Swagger.
